titleStmt.title: The country mouse, and the city mouse. Or a merry morrall fable enlarged out of Horace. Serm. lib. 2. Sat. 6.
titleStmt.author: Saltonstall, Wye, fl. 1630-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Michael Sparke Iunior, and are to be sold at the blue Bible in Greene Arbour,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
